docs.lead_paragraph: I'm overwhelmed. Thanks for a warm welcome to Motherlode, and for a list of ideas for new topics that will keep me writing and you commenting for a long time (and, not to mention, help me bring in some great guest posters).
docs.abstract: Thanks for such a warm welcome to Motherlode. Here's where I think we'll go next.
docs.snippet: Thanks for such a warm welcome to Motherlode. Here's where I think we'll go next.

docs.lead_paragraph: “I want to be known as me,” Julia Restoin Roitfeld, Carine Roitfeld’s daughter, insists, “for what I can do on my own.”

headline.seo: Carine Roitfeld’s Daughter Builds Her Own Empire
headline.main: Building an Empire of Her Own
headline.print_headline: Building an Empire of Her Own

docs.abstract: Julia Restoin Roitfeld, fledgling designer, socialite and daughter of former French Vogue editor Carine Roitfeld, launches a lingerie collection for New York-based purveyor Kiki de Montparnasse.
docs.snippet: “I want to be known as me,” Julia Restoin Roitfeld, Carine Roitfeld’s daughter, insists, “for what I can do on my own.”
